title: Episode #29 - Why Are So Many Musicals About Revolutions?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
After a short break, Emma and Janina dive into the world of musical theatre, examining important shows and pondering the question, why are so many musicals about revolution?

Featuring:
Rambunctious revolutionaries!
Corpulent kings!
Bangers, wall-to-wall bangers!

Support History is Sexy here: www.ko-fi.com/hispod
